module.title: Work: Bookmarks
module.description:
Simple bookmark collection with tags.
Needs composer package "paquettg/php-html-parser": "^1.7".
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql:
<%?prefix%> CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>bookmarks` ( `bookmarkId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0', `visits` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `url` tinytext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `pageTitle` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `pageDescription` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `fulltext` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) DEFAULT NULL, `visitedAt` decimal(12,0) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bookmarkId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>bookmark_comments` ( `bookmarkCommentId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `bookmarkId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `userId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `votes` int(11) NOT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(10,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(10,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `votedAt` decimal(10,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bookmarkCommentId`), KEY `bookmarkId` (`bookmarkId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>bookmark_tags` ( `bookmarkTagId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `bookmarkId` int(11) NOT NULL, `userId` int(11) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `relatedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `usedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bookmarkTagId`), KEY `bookmarkId` (`bookmarkId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `title` (`title`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
